name: Uncle Kracker
description: '''Matthew Shafer''' (born June 6, 1974), also known by his stage name '''Uncle Kracker''', is an American singer and musician. He was previously a turntablist for [[Kid Rock]]'s backing group [[Twisted Brown Trucker]]; since 1999, he has recorded as a solo artist. His singles "[[Follow Me (Uncle Kracker song)|Follow Me]]" and "[[Drift Away#Uncle Kracker featuring Dobie Gray version|Drift Away]]" were top 10 hits on the [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]].
